org.ldaptive.provider

Interface ProviderConnectionFactory<T extends ProviderConfig>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of provider config for this connection factory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJLdapConnectionFactory, AbstractProviderConnectionFactory, ApacheLdapConnectionFactory, JLdapConnectionFactory, JLdapSSLConnectionFactory, JLdapStartTLSConnectionFactory, JndiConnectionFactory, JndiStartTLSConnectionFactory, OpenDJConnectionFactory, UnboundIDConnectionFactory, UnboundIDStartTLSConnectionFactory

    public interface ProviderConnectionFactory<T extends ProviderConfig>
    Provides an interface for creating provider connections.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProviderConnection create()
      Create a connection to an LDAP.
      T getProviderConfig()
      Returns the provider configuration.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the provider configuration.
        Returns:
        provider configuration

      • create

        ProviderConnection create()
                          throws LdapException
        Create a connection to an LDAP.
        Returns:
        provider connection
        Throws:
        LdapException - if an LDAP error occurs
